channel.title: Help with run file
channel.description:
Hello guys, im coming back to the server business lol, help me with this run error :
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
All help appreciated <3

item.title: Help with run file
item.dc:creator: @adamb292 adamb292
item.description:
@adamb292 wrote:

ok, im getting this now - Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Help with run file
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

@echo off
cd Bin
"C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
exit

or

@echo off
cd Bin
"C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
exit

Not sure which, I don’t use windows.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with run file

@adamb292 wrote:

so can u give me exactly what it should be?

then use the code i gave you before.
Replace 25 with 26.

item.description:
@adamb292 wrote:

ok my version is 1.6.0_26, so what should my run file look like, atm it is this :

@echo off
cd Bin
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
exit

item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Replace java with your java’s bin directory that leads to java.exe
